src.tool
类 ApproximateCalculation

java.lang.Object
  src.tool.ApproximateCalculation

public class ApproximateCalculation
extends java.lang.Object

This class determines the relation between two number of double type, within error can be tolerated.

版本：
1.0
作者：
zqliu

alreadyEqual

public boolean alreadyEqual(double a,
                            double b)
This method compares two numbers, checks whether they are equal within an error.

参数：
a - The first number
b - The second number
返回：
true, if the absolute value of the difference of these two numbers is less than error specified; false, otherwise.

strongLess

public boolean strongLess(double a,
                          double b)
This method compares two numbers, checks whether the first number is strongly smaller than the second number, within an error.

参数：
a - The first number
b - The second number
返回：
true, if b-a is more than error; false, otherwise

weakLess

public boolean weakLess(double a,
                        double b)
This method compares two numbers, checks whether the first number is weakly smaller than the second number, within an error.

参数：
a - The first number
b - The second number
返回：
true, if a-b is less than error; false, otherwise

strongMore

public boolean strongMore(double a,
                          double b)
This method compares two numbers, checks whether the first number is strongly larger than the second number, within an error.

参数：
a - The first number
b - The second number
返回：
true, if a-b is more than error; false, otherwise

weakMore

public boolean weakMore(double a,
                        double b)
This method compares two numbers, checks whether the first number is weakly larger than the second number, within an error.

参数：
a - The first number
b - The second number
返回：
true, if b-a is less than error; false, otherwise
